entry.title: Palestinian Death Statistics Remain a Subject of Controversy
entry.content: Three weeks into Israel’s massive bombing campaign in the Gaza Strip, the exact scope of Palestinian casualties has become yet another controversy after President Biden questioned statistics published by the Hamas-run Gaza health authorities.

entry.title: Israel Says It Has Killed a Planner of Oct. 7 Attack
entry.content: Israel’s military said its ground forces continued to fight inside Gaza after an intense wave of airstrikes and ground raids.

entry.title: Americans Stuck in Gaza. 'Are We U.S. Citizens or Not?'
entry.content: Ramped up Israeli bombing is jeopardizing efforts to evacuate the hundreds of American citizens stranded in Gaza.
